## datamon repo

Commands to manage repos

### Synopsis

Commands to manage repos.

A datamon repository is analogous to a git repository.

Repos are datasets with a unified lifecycle.
They are versioned and managed via bundles.


### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for repo
```
